title: Remember left's corruption
text:
ANALYSIS/OPINION:

The collaboration of the mainstream media and “deep state” unelected bureaucrats with corrupt, anti-Trump politicians over these past three years has now gained momentum, with so-called moderate Democratic representatives joining the chorus of Rep. Jerry Nadler in seeking the impeachment of President Trump.

That our president has weathered these false accusations shows his commitment to the American people in dismantling the left’s corrupt criminal empire. Come next November, these fools must be held accountable for their irresponsible behavior. No other president in the history of this country has had to undergo this kind of abusive spying, deep-state resistance, unnamed accusers with invented accusations or the continued scream for impeachment since even before his election.

There is no longer any such thing as a moderate Democrat. The left knows its candidates will not beat President Trump at the ballot box, so impeachment is its only game plan for returning this country to tyranny. The reality is, President Trump is not the real target — “We, the People” are. They hate us for having the temerity to challenge their corrupt stranglehold on the government and the rule of law. Next November, we will not forget what they’ve attempted to do.

AL QUARTARARO

Virginia Beach, Va.
